content: until last 23 27 37 sts k to end total stitch count total stitch count 260 306 348 378 420 184 216 240 264 296 continue in mc for sizes 3 4 only work in stockinette until piece measures 11 12 in mc k 1 round 13 14 15 or 28 30 5 33 35 5 38 cm from co edge work chart 5 © copyright dear ingénue | all rights reserved | 2022 | v 1 1 5 phd candidate in mc work in stockinette until body measures for size 1 only approx 10 75 11 11 11 5 12 27 5 28 28 set-up round k2tog k to 3 sts before end ssk k1 29 30 5 cm or to desired length be sure to leave length for 2 5cm of ribbing for sizes 2 3 4 5 only k 1 round work in 1x1 ribbing for 2 5cm total sleeve stitch count 54 64 72 80 88 bobble all sts using tubular bind-off instructions for this technique are located below decrease round k2tog k to 3 sts before end ssk k1 repeat decrease round every 5 75 75 1 1 or 1 5 2 2 tubular bind-off measure out a tail at least 3 times the length to be 2 5 2 5 cm three 3 more times bound off thread onto a tapestry needle insert a locking st marker into the first two sts without total sleeve stitch count removing them from the left-hand needle 48 56 64 72 80 step 1 knit column insert tapestry needle into the first st knitwise and slip off the needle skip the purl st work in stockinette until sleeve measures 9 5 insert tapestry needle into the next knit st purlwise 24cm from underarm or 9 23cm from desired and pull yarn through length step 2 purl column insert tapestry needle into the first st purlwise and slip off the needle skip the next work chart 6 knit st and come around from the back to the front inserting the tapestry needle into the next purl st set-up decrease round k 2 2 6 4 3 k2tog *k 6 5 14 knitwise between the last 2 sts on the needle not 10 8 k2tog repeat from * to last 4 3 8 6 5 sts k around the end of the work and pull yarn through to end repeat steps 1 & 2 until there are 2 live sts on the needle use first 2 sts on locking st marker to repeat steps 1 & 2 total sleeve stitch count once more all sts are now bound off 42 48 60 66 72 work chart 7 sleeves repeat for both sleeves set-up decrease round k 2 1 4 4 1 k2tog *k 5 4 5 4 4 k2tog repeat from * to last 3 3 5 6 3 sts k to with larger needles and beginning at the center end of underarm sts pick up and k 2 2
